description: This notification is sent whenever avipsPeerIsakmpState moves
into the 'established' state.

event.Summary: Avips peer $v1 ISAKMP state changed to established

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsIskampEstablished AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerLocalAddress a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteAddress a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerIsakmpStateLastChange t 31536000 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The IP address of the local peer.
This is derived from the local-address specified in the
crypto-list that creates this connection.
If the local peer type is an IP Address, then
this is identical to avipsPeerLocalValue.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerLocalAddress

description: The IP address of the remote peer.
If the remote peer type is an IP Address, then this
is identical to avipsPeerRemoteValue.
If the remote peer type is a fqdn, then this is
the IP address that was received by DNS resolution
of the fqdn specified in IsakmpIdentityValue.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteAddress

description: sysUpTime when the last change in avipsPeerIsakmpState
occured, in hundredths of a second.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerIsakmpStateLastChange

description: Free text describing the remote peer or peer-group.
The value of this field is taken from
avipsIsakmpPeerDescription.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteDescription

description: This notification is sent whenever avipsPeerIsakmpState moves
into the 'closed' state, excluding during row creation.

event.Summary: Avips peer $v1 ISAKMP state changed to closed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsIskampClosed AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerLocalAddress a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteAddress a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerIsakmpStateLastChange t 31536000 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteDescription s EXAMPLE

this is identical to avipsPeerLocalValue.

If the remote peer type is a fqdn, then this is

description: sysUpTime when the last change in avipsPeerIsakmpState
occured, in hundredths of a second.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerIsakmpStateLastChange

description: Free text describing the remote peer or peer-group.
The value of this field is taken from
avipsIsakmpPeerDescription.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsPeerRemoteDescription

description: This notification is sent whenever avipsPeerIsakmpState moves
into the 'failed' state.

event.Summary: Avips peer $v1 ISAKMP in failed state

description: This notification is sent whenever avipsTunnelState moves
into the 'established' state.

event.Summary: Avips tunnel $v1 state changed to established

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsIpsecTunnelEstablished AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelLocalAddress a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelRemoteAddress a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyLocalSubnet a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyLocalMask a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyRemoteSubnet a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyRemoteMask a 192.0.2.1 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelStateLastChange t 31536000 AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelDescription s EXAMPLE

description: The IP address of the local peer.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelLocalAddress

description: The IP address of the remote peer.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelRemoteAddress

description: The local subnet address this tunnel protects.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyLocalSubnet

description: The local subnet mask this tunnel protects.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyLocalMask

description: The remote subnet address this tunnel protects.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyRemoteSubnet

description: The remote subnet mask this tunnel protects.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelProxyRemoteMask

description: sysUpTime when the last change in avipsTunnelState
occured, in hundredths of a second.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelStateLastChange

description: Free text describing this tunnel.
The value of this field is taken from the
description specified for the crypto-list rule that
creates this tunnel.
variables.name: AVAYA-IPSEC-MIB::avipsTunnelDescription

description: This notification is sent whenever avipsTunnelState moves
into the 'closed' state, excluding during row creation.

event.Summary: Avips tunnel $v1 state changed to closed
